cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4089, Darren Drake Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 109 (Wednesday, June 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GOTTHEIMER:
H.R. 4089.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 3 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.
[Page H3082]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

title: Darren Drake Act
